#summary Obtaining gstreamer-java source

= Introduction =

The gstreamer-java source is hosted in an external mercurial repository.


= Details =

To get the source use mercurial on the command line:
{{{
hg clone http://hg.assembla.com/gstreamer-java gstreamer-java
}}}

or checkout the project in your IDE using http://hg.assembla.com/gstreamer-java as the mercurial repository.
